data.title: Drinking on a budget
data.text: Large drinks at a value price!!. Nice sport bar with entertainment. Pool tables  Large beer selection

data.title: Hadn't eaten here for a while and was pleasantly surprised
data.text:
First of all in the interest of full disclosure I used to be an owner of this establishment but sold out a few years back. 

On this past Tuesday night I dropped in to play a game of darts and decided to try out some of the new menu.  The pizza is always good, hand tossed and not too sweet, but I had a craving for a burger and my friend wanted to try the fish and chips (I always rave about it). 

The staff recommendation was the Jameson Burger and was very surprised at the quality, it was fresh, well cooked and had the perfect blend of flavors.  The Jameson Whiskey BBQ sauce was not overpowering and just enough was used to give it the perfect flavor. I'm a stickler for the right bun on a burger and again they didn't disappoint me, the soft but crispy sourdough bun was a perfect bread for this burger. For a side dish I opted for the onion rings and again it proved the right choice, fresh homemade thin string onion rings made in classic New England style, for a minute I thought I was at a seafood restaurant the rings were so good.

My Friend was quiet for a change, well until I stole some of her fish and chips, then I understood why, it was also perfect,  the fish and the batter were both fresh and the right amount of batter was on the fish. Also you could see from both the fish and the handout homemade french fries that the oil was also fresh.

I was great to go somewhere, get real french fries and onion rings (not frozen machine manufactured crap), fresh fish hand battered and a handmade burger cooked to perfection.

As people that read my reviews here and on Facebook know, when I like something it must be good, this was not good, it was perfect. I won't hesitate on going here again when I want good pub food.

data.title: Great People Great Food
data.text: I wanted there with a few friends and the wait staff is good and they are very friendly. The food is very good would go there again.

data.title: Entertained & Fed
data.text: I love this place.  It's just a laid-back, relaxing place of business to have a few drinks, eat, and listen to music.

data.title: Best Guinness Anywhere
data.text: Friendly place, Irish owned.  They keep the tap system clean, move a lot of Guinness, and know how to pour it.  Food is ok, but come for the Guinness.
